Author: roboadvisorcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] RoboAdvisorCoin - The first RoboAdvisor for cryptocurrencies
Body: The long wait has an end: RoboAdvisorCoin (RAC) launched its brand new website: the first Robo-Advisor exclusively dedicated to cryptocurrencies and digital assets.  Thanks to the use of Blockchain technology and Artificial Intelligence, the platform will offer exclusive real-time forecasts and risk analytics of cryptocurrencies and stocks   After its ICO, RoboAdvisorCoin (RAC), the first Robo-Advisor dedicated to the world of cryptocurrencies and stocks, has officially launched its brand new website: www.roboadvisorcoin.com, offering exclusive real-time forecasts and risk analytics of cryptocurrencies and stocks.  The main platform, namely SelfieWealth, has been extensively tested over the last four years by providing forecasts and performance analytics for traditional securities including equities, bonds, ETFs, and mutual funds. Since last August, the Artificial Intelligence architecture on which RoboAdvisorCoin is based has produced daily reports and forecasts for more than 1,200 cryptocurrencies and tokens, generating a fully automated original source of specialized information thanks to a big data framework, in which thousands of cryptocurrencies and securities are daily monitored.  About the AI driven platform As the demand for cryptocurrencies trading increases, RAC aims to empower users with accurate real-time forecasts and statistical analyses related to the fast-evolving market of cryptocurrencies and stocks in exchange of RAC tokens. In producing trend analysis, predictions and recommendations, the platformâ€™s AI adapts in real time to market changes and cycles. Thanks to a constant monitoring of the forecastâ€™s accuracy and risk measures, our team can promptly intervene in case of market anomalies or structural changes. Simplicity and ease of use are priority with RoboAdvisorCoin. The service provided might be explained as a hybrid between platforms such as Spotify and Bloomberg, since:  It will offer its users the ability to select and track a personal â€œplaylistâ€ of preferred cryptocurrencies and stocks, also equipping them with a full set of on-demand analytics and forecasting tools; It represents a digital platform, which fully exploits the timeliness and accuracy of complex machine learning algorithms in the context of big data analytics to provide reliable, personalized predictions and performance measures on cryptocurrencies and stocks.     Pricing The abovementioned services will be exclusively available through a monthly subscription payable in RAC tokens. This is due to the fact that there will be an improvement of the existing infrastructure using blockchain related technologies and the production of accurate, objective and timely forecasts as personalized reports and news will be possible thanks to the RAC contributors.  3-week free trial: Users subscribing until June 30, 2018, will enjoy a 3-week trial of our daily news and cryptocurrency forecasts service. Premium Plan:After June 30, RoboAdvisorCoin offers different subscription plans, which offer you access to its exclusive cryptocurrency services.  Subscription plans    1 month =   10 RACs 3 month =   15 RACs 6 month =   24 RACs 12 month =   36 RACs  *RAC tokens are available until June 30th, 2018 in the RoBET token sale.  Team of international experts RoboAdvisorCoin counts on a wide, experienced and outstanding team of international professionals guaranteeing the best evolution of the technological project. RoboAdvisorCoin represents a cutting-edge mix of Artificial Intelligence, big data analytics, and Blockchain technologies applied to Digital Currencies and stocks. This makes RAC an indispensable support tool for the design and optimization of crypto and stock trading strategies and risk management.  All information relating to the services available, pricing as well as terms and conditions are available on the abovementioned dedicated website.

Author: roboadvisorcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] RoboAdvisorCoin - The first RoboAdvisor for cryptocurrencies
Body: Our project started with an ICO and it moves forward step by step. After the ICO we continued our hard work and, as everyone knows, hard work pays off.  So, we're proud to announce that RoboAdvisorCoin has reached a new level and RAC tokens can now be used on the platform. If you want to join our services, you just need to visit our website and choose the best solution for you! You can register for free, or subscribe one of the Premium plan packages, using RAC tokens.  Subscription plans  The free registration allows you to keep an eye on the most important cryptos, the best forecast and the best performer. You can also read our daily robo news and discover the first 3 best predictions about coins, tokens, crypto indices and large caps.  Many other services are available for premium plan subscribers. You can take advantage of the full list of our robo predictions, know all the crypto details and use the watchlist. All the services we'll add in the future will be included automatically.  If you want to join the Premium plan, you've to follow these steps:  Purchase RACs If you don't own RACs right now, you can buy them on etherdelta , forkdelta, or on the RoBET platform.  Registration and sending RACs to your personal wallet on the platform Once you have your RAC tokens, you need to register , go to the wallet section and copy your RAC wallet address. Then, you can send the tokens to your address in order to use them.  Subscription You can choose among three premium packages: 1 month - 10 RACs 3 months - 25 RACs 12 months - 100 RACs  You already have an ongoing subscription? You can still extend your plan. You don't have enough RACs in your wallet? The packages with a higher cost will be disabled and you'll be prompted to buy more tokens.

Author: roboadvisorcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] RoboAdvisorCoin - The first RoboAdvisor for cryptocurrencies
Body: Hello, it is a very interesting feedback.  In order to answer your questions 1) you can see our daily predictions here: https://roboadvisorcoin.com/crypto-predictions/. 2) 3) The unsold tokens will be burnt. More precisely: * we will generate 4,000,000 RAC, then we will allocate 2,000,000 RAC to the ICO and we will keep 2,000,000 RAC for the platform. * Then at the end of the ICO, in case the Hard Cap is not reached, we will see how many tokens were issued during the ICO. * So assume that X RAC tokens will be sent to contributors. * In this case, we will keep X tokens for us. * The remainder 4,000,000 - 2*X  RAC tokens will be burnt.  So at the end of the ICO (in case the ICO will be successfully), the proportion between the tokens sent to contributors and the tokens kept by the plaftorm will be guaranteed to be 50% and 50%.  Probably we will have to update our whitepaper to make more explicit what happens to unsold tokens.

Author: roboadvisorcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] RoboAdvisorCoin - The first RoboAdvisor for cryptocurrencies
Body: It is a completely different project, "copy trader is a marketplace between expert trader  and newbie traders " -  citation from their website. Our project since 2013 already used machine learning to perform AI based predictions on "traditional" financial markets. Since August 2017 we started to adapt our algorithm to the crypto world. As you know cryptocurrencies are very volatile and have very specific characteristics. We aim at improving our platform using blockchain technologies to secure our predictions in order to be fair and unchangeable   Join our Telegram channel: https://t.me/roboadvisorcoin

Author: roboadvisorcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] RoboAdvisorCoin - The first RoboAdvisor for cryptocurrencies
Body: Sorry for the delay in our answer. Well, our priority after the token launch will be to expand our team to improve the expertise and operations in the Robo-Advisory domain. We intend to attract the most talented and accomplished personnel currently available in relevant areas including: Blockchain, Machine Learning, Fintech industries and Financial Markets. we plan to further improve our existing infrastructure both relating to the production of accurate and timely forecasts and the production of personalized news. In addition to that, as part of Milestone 1, we plan to create indexes for crypto-currencies which approximate market trends for the sector and contain all the currently existing Cryptos and Token. The Robo Advisor Coin platform will be the first system able to accept RAC in exchange for crypto financial analysis and all the services based on our AI engine. We will carry out marketing activities to promote our updated platform to a greater number of countries, including in Asia. Our website provides a full roadmap : https://roboadvisorcoin.com/#roadmap have a look at it.

Author: roboadvisorcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] RoboAdvisorCoin - The first RoboAdvisor for cryptocurrencies
Body: RoboAdvisorCoin - The first RoboAdvisor for cryptocurrencies November 24 until December 24, 2017 - JOIN the ICO     RoboAdvisorCoin official channels:  RAC website - Twitter - Telegram -  Reddit - Youtube    RoboAdvisorCoin: What is it all about?  Intelligent, fast, and neutral forecasts about cryptos and tokens secured in the blockchain by our AI engine  Objective forecasts and analytics  The main platform has been extensively tested over the last four years by providing forecasts and performance analytics for traditional securities including equities, bonds, ETFs, and mutual funds.   First Robo-advisor for cryptocurrencies and digital assets  Since August 2017 RoboAdvisorCoin offers daily reports and forecasts for more than 1,200 cryptos and tokens.  RoboAdvisorCoin- a cutting-edge mix  The platform represents a cutting-edge mix of artificial intelligence, big data analytics, and Blockchain technologies applied to Digital Currencies and Digital Assets.  4 Milion  Tokens generated for campaing, advisors, parteners, ICO costs, team, future company financing. 15% Automatically locked for 12 months by smart contract.  The team behind  The project counts on a wide, experienced and outstanding team of international professionals guaranteeing the best evolution of the technological project.     Check out the video       OUR GOALS RoboAdvisorCoin aims to:   â€¢ Create a platform which allows users to collect, elaborate, navigate and utilize big data related to global financial assets including Cryptos and tokens all secured and distributed in the blockchain  â€¢ Provide unique Crypto indexes, forecasts, research, statistics and relevant news items on this exciting and growing asset class.  â€¢ Offer timely, accurate, objective and cost effective investment research reports produced by AI-powered software.  â€¢ Provide a number of educational services aimed at improving the financial acumen of its users.          Starting from Nov 9, users can join our bounty program and earn our tokens. Further details: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2379671.msg24303226#msg24303226           "Most of the time, customers do not get the advice they need but rather the advice their advisor thinks they need, based on a desire not to deviate to far from conventional wisdom, or on a desire to maximise the potential to sell products to them. This conflicted situation arises so often that an intelligent user can never really know which human generated advise they can really trust. Now, imagine a world in which all advices received was neutral, honest and never manipulated by human biases and beliefs. Thatâ€™s the exciting new world of opportunities which the Robo Advisor Coin project represents."      RoboAdvisorCoin official channels:  RAC website - Telegram - Twitter -LinkedIn - Slack -  Reddit - Youtube

Body: Hi! I think this project is overlooked, i looked at your website and twitter, it seems that only past successful predictions are available for common people. Do you make public future predictions? This would be useful for potential investors to see that project works.

Author: roboadvisorcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] RoboAdvisorCoin - The first RoboAdvisor for cryptocurrencies
Body: Actually our predictions include both: future predictions and past successful predictions. We invite you therefore to have a look at our latest news: today we suggest to pay attention to Bitcoin Cash (BCH). Let's see what the future brings for this cryptocurrency. https://roboadvisorcoin.com/according-to-the-rac-it-is-the-moment-of-bitcoin-cash-that-can-grow-again-by-47-2/ Our news usually focus on a few cryptocurrencies. If you are interested in an overview, which includes a rash of cryptocurrencies (Top 50 cryptocurrencies according to our roboadvisor),  you should visit our "crypto predictions" page. https://roboadvisorcoin.com/crypto-predictions/ All predictions available on this page are ALWAYS public future predictions.
